bibl.title: Alexandrian Coins in the University Museum Zagazig. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Briefly reviews the coins found in Tell Basta (Bubastis) with a special focus on the coin collection in the University Museum Zagazig. 58 coins minted in Alexandria during the Graeco-Roman period are currently exhibited; 12 of these coins dating to the Roman Period are published.
bibl.seg: Loth Marc, Alexandrian Coins in the University Museum Zagazig. Avec résumé en anglais.

Briefly reviews the coins found in Tell Basta (Bubastis) with a special focus on the coin collection in the University Museum Zagazig. 58 coins minted in Alexandria during the Graeco-Roman period are currently exhibited; 12 of these coins dating to the Roman Period are published.
